column4: is there an irc client that is = to mIRC on windows? or really close to it?
!mirc
there are dozens of irc clients
I'm using XChat right now, but it's missing so many things.
like what?
cant nick+tab in query, cant ctrl+tab / ctrl+w to move from a tab to the other, cnat ctrl+q to go from query to query
the windows/apple button
you need to use gutsy
you have to use gutsy
that's right, but it's your only option if you want to use kernel 2.6.22
no
well you can, but it will be an unsupported configuration
will my nvidia card work on it?
i guess, you'll need drivers compiled against the new kernel though
can I have gutsy and my old ubuntu? like gutsy built on the new kernel and 7.04 built on my .16?
sure, you can dual-boot feisty and gutsy
what is wubi?
usually takes an 'alternate' form of the iso.
are you running it as root?
no.. mmm.
you must run it as root in order to capture anything
thx :)
although it is well known for having a lot of security issues, best to capture with tcpdump or kismet then analyze with wireshark as a user
alright.
